page.title: 03Daisy Cottage
page.content: {Daisy Cottage,}the oldest building in the village is Georgain.It used to be a pair of semi_detched cottages but has been one cottage for a long time now. It was built out of the Abbey bricks. It has a tiled roof and three chimney stacks.The windows have very small panes of glass and some are still bricked up from the days when there was a tax on windows. It is in a poor condition and the gable at the east end is leaning and there is a six inch gap in the roof which is starting to sag.There is a great danger that it may collapse and we shall no longer have a Daisy Cottage.Although the cottage is occupied, the cost of renovation would be too great for the owners and its future is uncertain.
